body:
The hit registration is off and players are invisible. Yeah.

I was playing on Candoria and I could see players being hit and killed by no one. It wasn't assassin either because no donators were in game.

Also, sometimes you take damage way to fast. You will receive 3 hits during the time you would normally receive one. This isn't hacking either. I got caught on fire once and I took damage 3 times in half a second from it. My ping is 300-150 so I dont think it is a ping problem.
body_tagged:

title: WTF is wrong with Nexus?

replies.body:
The invis glitch is due to multiple spawns in Candoria.

The fast hit thing is a glitch that'll eventually get fixed :/
